body.name: Real Barrier Extreme Cream 1.69 oz Tube | Daily Skin Barrier Repair Face Moisturizer Cream with Hyaluronic Acid and Ceramides for Sensitive Dry Skin | Longlasting Soothing Hydration | Korean Skin Care
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 19 hrs 32 mins
features: SKIN BARRIER REPAIR FACE MOISTURIZER CREAM: Does your skin dry out no matter what you put on it? If it is a repeated problem, you need to quickly restore your skin barrier with an ultra-moisturizing skin barrier repair face moisturizer cream. Extreme Cream is a skin barrier recovery face moisturizer cream that strengthens the skin's healthy barrier

FAST SKIN BARRIER REPAIR: By reproducing the actual structure of the skin barrier, this face moisturizer cream absorbs 2 times faster than others, and improves the skin barrier twice as fast in a day. After a week of use, the skin barrier will be improved by 85.42%, and after 2 weeks – up to 99.5%

SENSITIVE SKIN RELIEF: Recovers & repairs skin barrier damaged by external irritation more than 2 times faster and within just 5 days of use. Extreme Cream is a perfect solution for dry skin, itchy skin, improves redness, and skin irritation, and strengthens the skin barrier. This face moisturizer cream has completed hypoallergenic, non-comedogenic, and non-irritation clinical tests for sensitive skin, dry skin, and skin with eczema

3-LAYERS MOISTURIZING: The elastic creamy texture penetrates into the skin without stickiness as soon as it is applied, filling the skin barrier quickly and gently. This skin barrier repair face moisturizer cream also strengthens the skin moisture barrier, prevents stripping moisture, and locks in moisture deeply into the skin for 72 hours

PATENTED SKIN BARRIER REPAIR TECHNOLOGY MLE flawlessly mimics the lamellar structure of the natural skin lipids and provides the ultimate in revitalizing the sensitive skin's moisture through the restoration of the protective skin barrier system. Ideal for dry and sensitive skin

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: For Sensitive & Weakened Skin Barrier It is suitable for sensitive skin thanks to its hypoallergenic and low pH formula. Solution for Dry Skin / Itchy Skin / Redness / Irritated Skin / Strengthening Skin Barrier
Fast improvement of skin barrier Improves skin barrier two times faster and fully recovers the function of skin barrier in just five days

REAL skin barrier formula It contains 20,000ppm of Triple Ceramide that include patented "Omega-Ceramide" so that reproduces structure of real skin lipid. Long-lasting triple moisturizing It strengthens skin moisture barrier with "Biome Peptide" and prevents stripping moisture by "Aquaseal" ingredient. The Effect of (Quick) Improving Skin Barrier By reproducing the acturestructure of the skin barrier, the skin absorbs cream 2 times faster than others, and improves skin barrier twice as fast in a day.

MLE Technology Our skin barrier technology (MLE) flawlessly mimics the lamellar structure of the natural skin lipids and provides the ultimate in revitalizing the skin's moisture through the restoration of the protective barrier system. Ideal for dry and sensitive skin. The special cross pattern of the MLE shows that it is identical to the lipid lamellar structure of the skin. This provides a new standard for dermatological science.

What's your Skin concern? reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I definitely see a difference in the clarity of my skin! And it’s sensitive skin friendly!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 6, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Helped repair my barrier fast after a reaction . I love it it makes my skin look healthy and silky

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I actually bought this cream a few months ago. I used all the cream and for someone who is looking for a cream to keep my skin hydrated in the hot dessert heat; this is the cream. One of the things that I liked about this cream is that a little cream goes a long way. It absorbs into my skin well, which I appreciated because I am someone who doesn’t really wear makeup. I just don’t like how some products feel heavy on my face throughout the day. This moisturizer had no feeling of it being too much. Like I mentioned before…a little goes a long way. I did make the mistake the first time of using too much and it did feel heavy, but with less it was a perfect feeling on my face. Planning to repurchase, and also planning to try out the aqua gel version as well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 28, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great for Very Dry Skin
reviews.reviewText: I started using Retinol and my skin barrier was down, so I decided to purchase this cream.It was too thick for me so my skin broke out, but I think that's because I have combination skin.If you have very dry skin, I think you would like this.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for my dry sensitive skin
reviews.reviewText: I am currently using retinol so my skin is pretty dry and sensitive, and this cream is saving my skin. It doesn’t contain any scent so it won’t irritate your skin. The cream is pretty thick and creamy but not heavy. You don’t need much as it applies smoothly. It’s light weight. My skin feels very moisturized and comfortable throughout the day. I also like that it doesn’t make my skin oily. Overall, I really enjoy this cream.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love this stuff
reviews.reviewText: I use a strong prescription tretinoin medication for anti aging and mild acne. As a result, my skin peels and is left feeling a little raw. This is a great barrier cream for using with strong dermal medications, to lessen the harshness they have on my face and neck. I also use it as a final layer after applying all my serums and moisturizer products at night. It is like having a cream based Vaseline. I can also use it with my foundation and concealer.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Moisturizer for tretinoid treatment
reviews.reviewText: If you use tretinoid, this is a good moisturizer for layering. I apply this moisturizer prior and after applying my tretinoid cream. It helps restoring my skin barrier and it soothes my skin. The texture is creamy yet it absorbs quickly. I also use their facial wash, Real Barrier makes lovely products for dry, dehydrated and sensitive skin.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Does not do what it said
reviews.reviewText: I have dry/sensitive skin, and this absolutely ruined my skin. I wanted to give it three weeks, but after one week it made my skin extremely dry and with red patches. It said it was good for sensitive skin, and all the reviews were positive so I thought it must be good, but it was absolutely horrible for my skin. It also has a medicine smell when you apply it, and it is incredibly thick.
